parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The name of the stream that you want to query. Specify this parameter in the following format: `rtmp://Ingest domain/Application name/Stream name`.

parameters.name: Stream
parameters.description: The operation that you want to perform. Set the value to **DescribeLiveUpVideoAudioInfo**.
